attributes.action: Build Specialist Emergency Care Hospital in Sutton & invest in Epsom & St.Helier
attributes.additional_details: St Helier hospital is falling down and health provision is failing in Epsom and St Helier
attributes.background: Immediately fully fund the Building Your Future Hospitals programme delivering a new Specialist Emergency Care Hospital in Sutton and invest in Epsom and St Helier hospitals before they fall down

rejection.details:
